# raadfiles

The goal of raadfiles is to manage information about the files used by raadtools. 

## Why raadfiles?

```{r timing}
library(raadtools)
system.time(rt_files <- sstfiles())

library(raadfiles)
system.time(rf_files <- oisst_daily_files())

range(rt_files$date)
range(rf_files$date)

length(rt_files$date)
length(rf_files$date)


```
